    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int lifes,
             float speed,
             java.lang.String pathImage,
             java.awt.Dimension spriteSize,
             java.awt.Point position,
             int[] sprites)
        Creates an Enemy with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        lifes - the number of times this Enemy can be hit by a Bomb
        speed - how often the Enemy will choose a new direction
        pathImage - path to the image this Enemy will use
        spriteSize - the size of a sprite
        position - where this entity will be spawned
        sprites - number of sprites (will be used as output for getNumFrames())
